GSILib.BModel

Class Newspaper

  • java.lang.Object
    • GSILib.BModel.Newspaper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XMLRepresentable

    public class Newspaper
extends java.lang.Object
implements XMLRepresentable
    This is the class Newspaper. It represents a set of PrintableNews which from a newspaper. There is one by day.
